## Bio

Chelsea N Wong, MD

T32 Post-Doctoral Fellow | Harvard Translational Research in Aging at HSL


Medical School: University of Illinois Urbana-Champaign

Residency: Beth Israel Deaconess Medical Center, Internal Medicine

Fellowship: Harvard Multicampus Geriatric Fellowship Program with Advanced 2nd Year in Research
